body_html: I guess Function is a pure operator without any internal state. Any data should be fed as input to it. If you want to save some state information you can make a module that saves the state data and give that as input to the function object.
body_text: I guess Function is a pure operator without any internal state. Any data should be fed as input to it. If you want to save some state information you can make a module that saves the state data and give that as input to the function object.
body: I guess Function is a pure operator without any internal state. Any data should be fed as input to it. If you want to save some state information you can make a module that saves the state data and give that as input to the function object.
